amendment.description: To increase Medicare payments for home health services furnished in a rural area.

vote.text: Amendment SA 989 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 989 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S8681, S8684; CR S8684; text: CR S8681) To increase Medicare payments for home health services furnished in a rural area.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 989 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Collins.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 989 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
